posts.post_content:
If interested, I would be willing to trade for SGC graded T3(s). If anyone is going to the National and wants try and find some trade material let me know.
Price is firm, Paypal only (with 3%). Postage $3 (1st class w/ del. conf.) Ins. add'l. $3 if you want it.
Johnson.......SGC 30 (light pencil mark on back).....$400
Thanks, Tony
Trades welcome also. See post for details.
